title: Effective Speaking: Speed and Clarity
summary: This short lecture emphasizes two crucial aspects of effective verbal communication: speaking at a good pace and ensuring clarity in articulation.
key_takeaways: For effective communication, it is important to maintain both speed and clarity in speech.
Being understood requires articulating words clearly and delivering them at an appropriate pace.

flashcards.question: What two qualities are essential for effective speaking?
Why is it important to speak fast and clear?
flashcards.answer: To ensure effective and understandable communication.
